elvisual 0.1.0

Package index

All functions

NAise()
Converts a zero-length vector to NA
el_categories()
Extract categories from metadata files in a directory
el_data()
Extract all metadata from a directory of flashcards
el_data_summary()
Summarizes metadata with counts of authors, organizations, keywords
el_freq_keywords()
Collects keywords table with their frequency
el_get_auteurs()
Extracts authors from a metadata XML object
el_get_info()
Extract metadata information from an XML object
el_get_keywords()
Extracts keywords from a metadata XML object
el_get_xml()
Gets the XML object from a metadata folder
el_graph()
Plot graph
el_graph_data()
Build graph data
el_map()
Generates a map visualizing the density of bounding box coverage
el_map_data()
Generates a grid with the density of bounding box coverage
el_plot_categories()
Plots frequencies of categories
el_time_duration()
Create a histogram of the duration of flashcard-related projects
el_time_hist()
Create a histogram of the number of flashcards per year
el_time_line()
Create a time_line plot
el_time_table()
Create a table with time information for each flashcard
el_wordcloud()
Create a wordcloud from a table of keywords
fbox()
Creation of a sf bounding box
fdate()
Extracts date from formatted ISO date strings

Developed by Lise Vaudor.
